Module moffett.scheduler
Package moffett.scheduler.helper

Class HelperFunctions

java.lang.Object
moffett.scheduler.helper.HelperFunctions
public abstract class HelperFunctions extends Object
Abstract class contains helper utilities used within the program.

    • changeStage

      public static void changeStage(String fxmlFileName, javafx.scene.Node node) throws IOException
      The approach modifies the stage to match the fxml file and aligns the stage accordingly.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFileName - targets fxml file to change.
      node - node for the event that calls the changeStage method used for defining current stage.
      Throws:
      IOException

      title - alert title.
      content - alert content.

      headerText - header text for alert.
      content - content text.

    • greeting

      public static void greeting()
      Method for sending alert to user once logged in, message depends on upcoming appointments and their status.

      Queries the database to get appointment information and checks to see if there are appointments starting in the next 15 minutes, sends an alert to the user with relevant information.
